abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice A Kirke Bartley Jr convicts Harco Construction of second-degree manslaughter, criminally negligent homicide and reckless endangerment in death of construction worker Carlos Moncayo at Lower Manhattan building site in 2015.
lead_paragraph: A closely watched case brings felony convictions in the death of Carlos Moncayo, who was crushed last year in a Lower Manhattan construction site.

headline.main: Construction Company Guilty of Manslaughter in Immigrant Worker’s Death
headline.print_headline: Construction Company Guilty of Manslaughter in Collapse That Killed a Man

snippet: A closely watched case brings felony convictions in the death of Carlos Moncayo, who was crushed last year in a Lower Manhattan construction site.
